mapper.sql: id, activity_id,user_id,tx_hash, block_height, block_hash, amount, contribution_degree, cal_status, status,create_time, update_time,is_deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into ex_ted_burn
id,
activity_id,
user_id,
tx_hash,
block_height,
block_hash,
amount,
contribution_degree,
cal_status,
status,
create_time,
update_time,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{txHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{blockHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{blockHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{contributionDegree,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{calStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.select: select from ex_ted_burn where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select from ex_ted_burn where 1=1 and cal_status = #{calStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 0 and is_deleted = 0 order by id asc
mapper.update: update ex_ted_burn set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}

update ex_ted_burn set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, block_height = #{blockHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, block_hash = #{blockHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
update ex_ted_burn set contribution_degree = #{contribution,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cal_status = #{calStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
update ex_ted_burn set is_deleted = 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
